Html:
I've been playing around with MVC, and realized that this simple project could be made to be even more simple and concise with the inclusion of the Razor view-engine with MVC 3.

Any plans to update this project?
Absolutely - I'm working on an update which will be available when MVC 3 is released.
Hey, thanks!  Sounds awesome, the Razor view-engine will make this very awesome!
